messageobject.name: LockedVehicle
messageobject.documentation: Asynchronous message. Sent as a response to ENTER command. Sent if the ENTER command was unsuccessfull because the vehicle is locked for our bot.

property.name: Id
property.documentation: Id of the vehicle, which we cannot enter, because it is locked.

property.name: Type
property.documentation: Type of the vehicle we wanted to enter. What kind of turret or car.
